forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 11pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds beneath a veil of clouds, casting a muted light over the city. As the day progresses, expect the temperatures to gently hover in the mid-fifties, dipping slightly as the afternoon approaches. The atmosphere carries a certain chill, accompanied by a light west-southwest breeze that brushes past, hinting at the potential for delicate rain later in the evening. Today, clarity feels somewhat elusive; the cloudy skies obscure the more vibrant hues typically seen in this part of the world, while a faint marine layer may be lurking nearby, especially along the edges where the bay meets the coastline.

With temperatures anticipated to rise slightly in the night, dressing in layers would be wise—think of a cozy sweater or a light coat to combat the coolness. A brisk walk along the waterfront could be a refreshing choice, allowing one to soak in the gentle sounds of the bay and perhaps indulge in a quiet moment at a local café, sipping on a warm drink while watching the world and its fleeting clouds drift by. As the evening approaches, keep an umbrella handy, for the whispers of rain might turn into a more pronounced serenade as the clock ticks past 11, ushering in a night of introspective charm.
